Stripe | Software Engineer (Type System)| San Francisco, CA / Seattle, WA / Remote | Full Time

Stripe has built and rolled out the first version of a static type system for Ruby to improve our ability to maintain and extend Stripe’s large and growing codebase. We need to extend the type checker, incorporate types into more of our code base, and create more of the tooling that the type checker enables.

We’re looking for people with a strong background in and interest in building language processing tools such as type checkers, semantic analysers, compilers, or IDEs. The ideal candidate will have a mix of technical expertise in language processing, a passion for solving developer experience problems, and a pragmatic ability to ship results iteratively. Code base is modern C++.
